remarks:
The law of concretion.  Special case of Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2013.) 

---

 The law of concretion.  Special case of Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61. Although this theorem would be useful with a distinct variable constraint between ` x ` , ` y ` , and ` z ` , we use ~ ax-bnd to eliminate that constraint.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2013.)
